pages.text: I hope you aren't arachnophobic, as the $(thing)Misty World$() is home to a few varieties of Hostile Giant $(thing)Spiders$(). This variety is only found on the $(thing)Forest/Meadow Zones$() and has a smaller body relative to the length of its legs.$(br2)Like other varieties, it will attack humans at night, but is more docile during the day.
